ygData.subject: Compiling Bard Song Information
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow Bards! As most of you already know, I have a living document on EQVault called Bard Spell Analysis v1.4 .  Since it was put up on that site,
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings fellow Bards!
As most of you already know, I have a living document on EQVault called "Bard Spell Analysis v1.4". Since it was put up on that site, I have received some good feeback, including corrections as well as some minor additions. I'm up to v 1.6 that I will be sending it in Monday for posting. If anyone has any information not in there already, I'd appreciate if you could drop me a line.
Looking through some of the archives, I've noticed that there is another Bard song document? Can someone forward me a copy? I'd like to merge that information into what I have already (and give credit where it's due, of course).
Lastly, there does seem to be two Bards mailing lists on onelist.com. I started EQ_Bards about a day before eqbards was born, but it looks like this list get's more discussion. I think that having two lists is rudundant and not very useful so I'm going to shut down EQ_Bards over the next two weeks and try and migrate everyone over to this list. BTW, who is the originator of this list?

-Alex
aka: Goatnatos, lvl 16 Bard, Povar Server
